name: ICE FOUNDATION
briefDescription: ICE Foundation  is an ISO 9001:2008 knowledge & Educational Trust  with key core areas of driving an attitude towards  change in the community and serving the community needs in areas of its development to achieve a macro effect from a micro initiative.Our focus areas are  skills education , assessments,intervention ,awareness and intervention  for developing an change environment.ICE Foundation is associated with Directorate General of Training ,Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship,Govt.of India as skill assessment body.Apart from various initiatives like skill development,awareness towards skill and working with various institution like NGO's,ITI's and Govt partners is a key initiative towards development and a focus agenda of ICE foundation vision plan
